greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of x^3*exp(-x)/(3*(1-x)).
comment: a(n) is the number of 3-cycles in all derangements of {1,2,...n}.
formula: In general, E.g.f. for the number of k cycles in the derangements of [n] is: x^k * exp(-x)/(k*(1-x)).
maple: a:= n-> n! * coeff (series (egf, x, n+1), x, n):
results.author: _Geoffrey Critzer_, Feb 01 2011
